translation.from: %name% requested a DCC CHAT session and asks you to connect to %IP% at port %port%. To accept the request, type /dccaccept
translation.to: %name% requested a DCC CHAT session and asks you to connect to %IP% at port %port%. To accept the request, type /dccaccept

translation.from: %name% seems to have removed the key, the session is now unencrypted!
translation.to: %name% seems to have removed the key, the session is now unencrypted!

translation.from: '%str%' was not found on your ignore list.
translation.to: '%str%' was not found on your ignore list.

translation.from: *** Waiting for connection on local interface %localSocketIP% at port %port% (external IP is %IP%)...
translation.to: *** Waiting for connection on local interface %localSocketIP% at port %port% (external IP is %IP%)...

translation.from: Always show console window on connection creation
translation.to: Always show console window on connection creation

translation.from: An account with the same name has already been added. Account names have to be unique.
translation.to: An account with the same name has already been added. Account names have to be unique.

translation.from: Are you sure you wish to remove this account?
translation.to: Are you sure you wish to remove this account?

translation.from: Automatically accept incoming key exchange requests
translation.to: Automatically accept incoming key exchange requests

translation.from: Automatically determine my external IP address
translation.to: Automatically determine my external IP address

translation.from: Automatically initiate a key exchange on incoming queries
translation.to: Automatically initiate a key exchange on incoming queries

translation.from: Automatically initiate a key exchange on queries you start
translation.to: Automatically initiate a key exchange on queries you start

translation.from: Automatically show Chat Room Browser window once connected
translation.to: Automatically show Chat Room Browser window once connected

translation.from: Connecting to %server% at port %port% (SSL is OFF)...
translation.to: Connecting to %server% at port %port% (SSL is OFF)...

translation.from: Connecting to %server% at port %port% using SSL...
translation.to: Connecting to %server% at port %port% using SSL...

translation.from: Control who is allowed to contact you
translation.to: Control who is allowed to contact you

translation.from: DCC connection has been closed. The last message may not have been sent.
translation.to: DCC connection has been closed. The last message may not have been sent.

translation.from: Do a /whois when someone messages me
translation.to: Do a /whois when someone messages me

translation.from: Don't reply to incoming CTCP requests
translation.to: Don't reply to incoming CTCP requests

translation.from: Error: You can't create a DCC CHAT session to yourself, sorry.
translation.to: Error: You can't create a DCC CHAT session to yourself, sorry.

translation.from: FiSH and mircryption compatible IRC encryption
translation.to: FiSH and mircryption compatible IRC encryption

translation.from: Fine tune server and proxy settings for this connection.
translation.to: Fine tune server and proxy settings for this connection.

translation.from: Manage other options for this account.
translation.to: Manage other options for this account.

translation.from: Only if no key was set previously
translation.to: Only if no key was set previously

translation.from: Only ops may change the topic
translation.to: Only ops may change the topic

translation.from: Opening network connection failed. Check server/port/nickname.
translation.to: Opening network connection failed. Check server/port/nickname.

translation.from: Output a warning when an unencrypted message is received from a secure channel
translation.to: Output a warning when an unencrypted message is received from a secure channel

translation.from: Please close any other open server browser windows first.
translation.to: Please close any other open server browser windows first.

translation.from: Prepend channel message nicks with mode prefix
translation.to: Prepend channel message nicks with mode prefix

translation.from: Received public key from %name%! Type /acceptkey to accept the request for an encrypted session.
translation.to: Received public key from %name%! Type /acceptkey to accept the request for an encrypted session.

translation.from: Received public key from %name%, sending mine...
translation.to: Received public key from %name%, sending mine...

translation.from: Send multiple lines as multiple messages
translation.to: Send multiple lines as multiple messages

translation.from: Sent my public key to %name%, waiting for reply...
translation.to: Sent my public key to %name%, waiting for reply...

translation.from: Set up sending and receiving messages at your discretion
translation.to: Set up sending and receiving messages at your discretion

translation.from: Show full user hosts on channel events
translation.to: Show full user hosts on channel events

translation.from: Show join/part/quit/kick/mode/nick events in channel and query windows
translation.to: Show join/part/quit/kick/mode/nick events in channel and query windows

translation.from: Some of these settings will only take effect the next time you connect to this account.
translation.to: Some of these settings will only take effect the next time you connect to this account.

translation.from: Sorry, Trillian can not understand this URI.
translation.to: Sorry, Trillian can not understand this URI.

translation.from: The active resource for this window has changed to "DCC CHAT".
translation.to: The active resource for this window has changed to "DCC CHAT".

translation.from: The active resource for this window has changed to "IRC server".
translation.to: The active resource for this window has changed to "IRC server".

translation.from: The following entries have been removed from your ignore list: %removed%
translation.to: The following entries have been removed from your ignore list: %removed%

translation.from: The nature of these settings requires that they are applied to all IRC accounts.
translation.to: The nature of these settings requires that they are applied to all IRC accounts.

translation.from: This functionality has not been implemented at this time.
translation.to: This functionality has not been implemented at this time.

translation.to: Use proxy for file transfers and DCC Chats

translation.from: WARNING: Could not update external IP address!
translation.to: WARNING: Could not update external IP address!

translation.from: When I go away, change nick name to %awayNickName%
translation.to: When I go away, change nick name to %awayNickName%
See You - Kick sponsored by www.trillian.im

This IRC server does not support the "safe list" feature. You will most likely get disconnected by the server's flood protection if there are many channels on the network. Use /raw LIST to continue anyway.
Sorry, your external IP is unknown, so you can't send a file or initiate a DCC CHAT. Please set your IP in the Preferences.
